snippet: With passage of a measure that may shut down most abortion clinics in Texas, women could turn to “abortion pills” without medical supervision.
abstract: Passage of stringent new abortion bill in Texas that may shut down most abortion clinics in state could make women turn to 'abortion pills' available across the border in Mexico; such pills are already used by thousands of Texas residents due to lack of health insurance or fear of stigma, and health experts worry about unmonitored use.
lead_paragraph: With passage of a measure that may shut down most abortion clinics in Texas, women could turn to “abortion pills” without medical supervision.

headline.main: A Pill Available in Mexico Is a Texas Option for Abortion
headline.print_headline: In Mexican Pill, A Texas Option For an Abortion
